Consider using `apply()` instead; `commit` writes its data to persistent storage immediately, whereas `apply` will handle it in the background

Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `SharedPrefManager` which has field `cont` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not concatenate text displayed with `setText`. Use resource string with placeholders.
String literal in `setText` can not be translated. Use Android resources instead.
String literal in `setText` can not be translated. Use Android resources instead.
